evidence.claim: Diagnose Early utilizes AWS services for its cloud infrastructure, including Lambda and S3 for data storage and processing.
The company supports integration with health standards such as FHIR and HL7 for interoperability with EHR systems.
There is mention of X12 for electronic data interchange in their documentation related to billing and insurance claim processing.
Analyze integration patterns including REST and GraphQL APIs for accessing health data and processing.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in EDI transactions for healthcare data exchange using X12 formats.
